memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, Loop< T > &XLoop, Model< T > XModel, Model< T > XModel_g)
memberdef.name: Calcmeanmax

briefdescription.para: Calculate mean and/or max of requested variables on GPU/CPU.

detaileddescription.para: Computes mean, max, and wet duration statistics for evolving variables, handling both CPU and GPU execution paths.

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, Loop< T > &XLoop, Model< T > XModel, Model< T > XModel_g)
memberdef.name: resetmeanmax

briefdescription.para: Reset mean and/or max statistics at output steps.

detaileddescription.para: Resets mean, max, and wet duration arrays after output is produced, handling both CPU and GPU paths.

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, Loop< T > XLoop, Model< T > XModel, Model< T > XModel_g)
memberdef.name: Initmeanmax

briefdescription.para: Initialize mean and max statistics at the start of the simulation.

detaileddescription.para: Sets up/reset statistics arrays for the initial simulation step.

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, BlockP< T > XBlock, T *&var, T val)
memberdef.name: resetvalGPU

briefdescription.para: Reset a variable array to a specified value on the GPU.

detaileddescription.para: Sets all elements of the array to the given value using a CUDA kernel.

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, BlockP< T > XBlock, T *Varmean, T *Var)
memberdef.name: addavg_varGPU

briefdescription.para: CUDA kernel to accumulate mean values for a variable.

detaileddescription.para: Adds the current value to the running mean for each cell on the GPU.

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, BlockP< T > XBlock, T ntdiv, T *Varmean)
memberdef.name: divavg_varGPU

briefdescription.para: CUDA kernel to divide mean values by the number of steps.

detaileddescription.para: Finalizes the mean calculation by dividing accumulated values by the number of time steps on the GPU.

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, BlockP< T > XBlock, T *h, T *u, T *v, T *U, T *hU)
memberdef.name: addUandhU_GPU

briefdescription.para: CUDA kernel to compute velocity magnitude and hU product.

detaileddescription.para: Calculates the velocity magnitude and its product with water depth for each cell on the GPU.

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, BlockP< T > XBlock, T *Varmax, T *Var)
memberdef.name: max_varGPU

briefdescription.para: CUDA kernel to compute max value for a variable.

detaileddescription.para: Updates the max value for each cell by comparing with the current value on the GPU.

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, BlockP< T > XBlock, T *Varmax, T *Var1, T *Var2)
memberdef.name: max_Norm_GPU

briefdescription.para: CUDA kernel to compute max velocity magnitude.

detaileddescription.para: Updates the max velocity magnitude for each cell by comparing with the current value on the GPU.

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, BlockP< T > XBlock, T *Varmax, T *Var1, T *Var2, T *Var3)
memberdef.name: max_hU_GPU

briefdescription.para: CUDA kernel to compute max hU value.

detaileddescription.para: Updates the max hU value for each cell by comparing with the current value on the GPU.

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, BlockP< T > XBlock, T *wett, T *h, T thresold, T time)
memberdef.name: addwettime_GPU

briefdescription.para: CUDA kernel to accumulate wet duration for each cell.

detaileddescription.para: Adds time to the wet duration for cells where water depth exceeds a threshold on the GPU.
